General.Name: Mosa Industrial Corp
General.Description: Mosa Industrial Corporation engages in the manufacture and sale of industrial and consumer products in Taiwan and internationally. It provides cream bottle, soda bottle, cylinder, and inflatable gun series products, as well as UBAR products and recipes. The company also offers driver-side dual-stage, passenger side, and curtain inflators. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Yunlin, Taiwan.
